name: Bubble Fruit Shooter
description:
Bubble Fruit Shooter Bubble 2016 - This is the most classic and amazing shooting bubble
Shoot fruit bubbles and match colors to pop and drop your way to rescue the trapped birds! You will be addicted to "Bubble Fruit Shooter Bubble 2016" from the first hit!
Play with your friends to see who can get complete level firs time!

Bubble Fruit Shooter Bubble 2016 - Match three or more fruit of the same color to pop the group. The goal of the game is to get the highest possible score and collect all stars on each level with limited number of fruit.

Bubble Fruit Shooter Bubble 2016 is a great casual puzzle game for all ages that features 30+ challenging levels with hours of entertainment. this HD fun game for all ages!
It may seem very cute, but it gets very very tricky, are you up to it?
Clear all the bubbles on the screen to level up:

How To Play Bubble Fruit Shooter Bubble 2016 :
- Tap where you want the fruit bubble.
- Group 3 or more fruit bubbles to make them burst.
- Burst bubbles with powerups to get them. Don't let them drop!

Game Features Bubble Fruit Shooter Bubble 2016 :

- Interesting and new game modes
- Over 30 challenging levels
- Bubbles in no particular order
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to master
- Fresh and beautiful style, bright and vibrant graphics & effects!
- Each with unique challenges and fun puzzles!

Thank for Bubble Fruit Shooter Bubble 2016
